title: Wckr Spgt Complete Discography
description:
In anticipation of the upcoming Wckr Spgt tribute album, here is the entire back catalog of studio releases.

Information (song lyrics, photos, historical notes, etc) pertaining to these releases may be found on the Wckr Spgt site:  www.wckrspgt.com

1983 Cassette Project #1
1984 Greatest Hits Vol. II
1984 The Monroe Pole Show
1985 Bar Nun (as Massive Fun)
1985 Filth (as Filth)
1985 Power Drops EP
1985 Spgtmuzik
1985 Mining to Hell (as Joe and the Weasels)
1985 The Magnificent Bloody Hawaiians (as The Bloody Hawaiians)
1985 Calfneck and Other Love Songs (as The Livin\&#039; B\&#039;Jesus)
1986 Bastard Son (as The Bloody Hawaiians)
1986 The Metro Brothers (as Sol and Hank)
1986 Spastic War Bats
1986 The Charles Mansion
1986 Drops of Love
1987 Dance Til You Stop
1987 Live \&#039;82-\&#039;87
1988 Mudworm Talk Sex Films
1988 Shindig / Codfucker
1988 Five Years
1988 Variations on Lisa (as Electric B\&#039;Jesus and the Livin\&#039; Bass Band)
1990 Cheese Box
1991 Four Song E.P.
1991 Live \&#039;87-\&#039;91
1992 Fire in the Hole
1992 Fortune Came Today
1992 Who Will Die?
1993 Pure Heaven
1993 Fake Party
1993 Cream
1994 The Threegos (as The Bloody Hawaiians)

1995 Live \&#039;91-\&#039;95

Relax and enjoy!
